snippet: South American champions Chile have been handed a stadium ban for the third time in the 2018 World Cup qualifying competition because of homophobic chanting by their fans, FIFA said on Monday....
lead_paragraph: South American champions Chile have been handed a stadium ban for the third time in the 2018 World Cup qualifying competition because of homophobic chanting by their fans, FIFA said on Monday.

headline.main: Chile Handed Third Stadium Ban for Homophobic Chanting
headline.print_headline: Chile Handed Third Stadium Ban for Homophobic Chanting
